SEARCH
Package tripleplay.ui

Class Widget<T extends Widget<T>>

java.lang.Object
tripleplay.ui.Element<T>
tripleplay.ui.Widget<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImageButton, SizableWidget, Slider, TextWidget
public abstract class Widget<T extends Widget<T>> extends Element<T>
The base class for all user interface widgets. Provides helper methods for managing a canvas into which a widget is rendered when its state changes.
